title: Abuse Elder
content:
When the older person is not caring for themselves this is called self-neglect.  
  

![Types of elder abuse and neglect infographic](https://healthify.nz/assets/Infographics/Types-of-elder-abuse-and-neglect-HN-950x690__ResizedImageWzYwMCw0MzZd.png)
_Image credit: Healthify He Puna Waiora_
####  What are the signs of possible elder abuse? 
It can be difficult to spot elder abuse. The older person may be ashamed or afraid to talk about it.
